unnormalised: Tuka khobor asa ki eka sopea rogtachê porikshentlean atam sambhavit anuvanshik purvagrahanchi vollokh korunk zata? PGx testing ani tumchê laginchê clinicant vyaktigat aushadhanchi mahiti ghevnuk tumchea doctork sampark korat.
normalised: Tumkam khobor asa ki ek sadho rogtacho test atam sambhavit anuvamshik purvagrahank ઓળखुंयेता? P-G-x test ani tumchea laginchya clinicant vyaktigat aushadha vishayan mahiti melouche khatir tumchea Doctorak sampark kar.
text: Tuka khobor asa ki eka sopea rogtachê porikshentlean atam sambhavit anuvanshik purvagrahanchi vollokh korunk zata? PGx testing ani tumchê laginchê clinicant vyaktigat aushadhanchi mahiti ghevnuk tumchea doctork sampark korat.
